name: Spin n Kill
description:
It's just you, your gun, and a bunch of zombies.
Survive as much as you can. Submitted to the Finally Finish Something 2022 Jam CONTROLS Move: WASD Shoot: Left click Reload: R Pause: Esc Hold SPACE to enter SPINNING MODE, spin the revolver with the mouse to activate your abilities. Abilities Full reload: ->, ->, ->

Automatic shooting: <-, <-, -> Hold down "shoot" and aim the zombies for automatic shots until ammo runs out or you release left click. Sound and music: "44 Magnum" by dcsimon under CC BY 3.0
https://freesound.org/people/dcsimon/sounds/139979/ "Revolver Reload" by LuannWepener under CC BY-NC 3.0
https://freesound.org/people/LuannWepener/sounds/326117/ "Big Zombie Hit 1" by Slave2theLight under CC BY 3.0
https://freesound.org/people/Slave2theLight/sounds/157105/ "terrifying zombie getting shot" by Bernuy under CC BY 3.0
https://freesound.org/people/Bernuy/sounds/277472/ "Honey Is Sweet, But Nostalgia Is Bitter" by Gigakoops under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/gigakoops/please-bring-peace-to-the-village-o... --------------- Sooo this is my first finished game ever and third project overall, so im not planning on updating this game anytime soon but your feedback will be very much appreciated, i guarantee at least half a minute of fun. Thanks for playing!
